statements: UPDATE customer_data SET customer_name = 'John Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com', phone_number = '1234567890' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE customer_data SET age = 30, location = 'New York', purchase_history = '{"total_purchases": 10}', preferences = '{"category": "Electronics"}' WHERE customer_id = 2;
UPDATE customer_data SET customer_name = 'Alice Smith', email = 'alice@example.com', age = 30, phone_number = '+1234567890' WHERE customer_id = 101;
UPDATE customer_data SET email = 'bob@example.com', location = 'New York', preferences = '{"category": "Electronics", "discount": 15}' WHERE customer_id = 102;
UPDATE customers SET customer_age = 25 WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE recommendations SET recommendation_text = 'Highly recommended product' WHERE recommendation_id = 2;
UPDATE customers SET customer_name='John Doe', customer_email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id=123;
UPDATE recommendations SET recommendation_text='Highly recommended product', recommendation_date='2022-10-15' WHERE customer_id=456;
UPDATE Customers SET age = 30 WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE PurchaseHistory SET amount = 50.99, purchase_date = '2022-03-15' WHERE purchase_id = 1001;
UPDATE Customers SET name = 'John Doe', age = 35 WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE PurchaseHistory SET amount = 150.50, purchase_date = '2022-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE customer_id = 1 AND product_id = 101;
UPDATE customers SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE purchases SET price=24.99, product_name='Tech Gadgets' WHERE purchase_id=5;
UPDATE customers SET email = 'example@email.com', phone_number = '+1234567890' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE purchases SET price = 15.99, purchase_date = '2022-01-15 10:30:00' WHERE customer_id = 2 AND product_name = 'Product A';
UPDATE customers SET email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id=1;
UPDATE products SET price=29.99, category='Electronics' WHERE product_id=5;
UPDATE customers SET full_name = 'John Doe', email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE orders SET total_amount = 200.50, order_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE order_id = 1001;
